name: Infinite Authority
originalText: All creatures with toughness 3 or less blocking target creature or blocked by target creature are destroyed at end of combat. At the end of the turn put a +1/+1 counter on the target creature for each creature destroyed in this manner during the turn. Counters remain on creature even if enchantment leaves play.

rulings.text: The enchanted creature gets a +1/+1 counter for each creature that triggers the ability.
Moving the enchantment after the ability triggers will not affect which creatures are affected.

text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked by a creature with toughness 3 or less, destroy the other creature at end of combat. At the beginning of the next end step, if that creature was destroyed this way, put a +1/+1 counter on the first creature.
